mapper.select:
SELECT h.id houseId, h.title title, h.rent_amt rentAmt, h.room room, h.hall hall, h.wei wei, h.acreage acreage, l.province province, l.city city, l.district district, l.street street, l.detail_addr detailAddr, l.longitude longitude, l.latitude latitude FROM t_zfang_house h, t_zfang_house_location l, t_zfang_apartment a WHERE h.id = l.house_id AND h.apartment_id = a.id AND h.is_delete = '00' AND h.type = #{type} AND h.status = '2' AND l.city = #{city}
ORDER BY h.sort_no ASC ORDER BY h.page_view DESC;
